settings.title: FAITH IN FLOWER
settings.content:
Founded on the power of flower. Grounded in hemp, hope and higher learning.

These statements have not been evaluated by the Food and Drug Administration. This product is not intended to diagnose, treat, cure or prevent any disease.

settings.subheading: CBD PRODUCTS TACKLING PROBLEMS IN A HEALTHIER WAY
CBD PRODUCTS TACKLING PROBLEMS IN A HEALTHIER WAY

settings.title: TINCTURE
settings.heading: Sleeping Beauty
settings.content:
Full spectrum CBD powers this all natural, highly potent sleep aid. The product is formulated with a unique blend of 5 different terpenes that work synergistically to relax the body into a deep sleep.  Valerian Root and Skullcap enhance the formulation for super effect. 

Shop Now

settings.title: SERUM
settings.heading: BLEMISH-BE-GONE
settings.content:
Anti-inflammatory CBD powers an extraordinary blend of natural ingredients including Burdock Root, Pine Bark Extract, Algae, Irish Moss, Melaleuca, Rosemary and Tea Tree oil to create and  support healthy skin that is inhospitable to breakouts.  The formula enables exfoliation of irritants and simultaneously hydrates the skin.  

Shop Now

settings.title: Our story

settings.title: Popup
settings.content: You can use this popup to display some useful information to your customers.

Science shows us that sleep is vital to our total health.
Sleep has a powerful effect on the immune system.
Sleep is essential to our overall well being.  

Faith In Flower aims to lull you into a you a peaceful, deep slumber. Settle your mind, slip into sweet dreams and sleep like a baby.
Founded on the power of Flower, graounded in hemp, hope, and higher learning

settings.heading: Sweet dreams
settings.content:
Science shows us that sleep is vital to our total health. Sleep has a powerful effect on the immune system. Sleep is essential to our overall well being.

Faith In Flower aims to lull you into a you a peaceful, deep slumber. Settle your mind, slip into sweet dreams and sleep like a baby.

settings.heading: You are beautiful
settings.content:
Skin-esteem is directly linked to our perceived attractiveness, which is inextricably linked to self-esteem. Psychological and social distress is a natural, normal response to skin symptoms.


We asked photographer Alex Moore to conduct a social experiment in the streets of Manhattan that explored how positive words help us access inner strength translating to outer beauty.

settings.heading: high quality hemp
settings.content:
Sun Grown in Oregon.
Organic Farming Practices.
Manufactured in The USA.
Pesticide Free.
Third-Party Testing.
From Seed to Sale with Love.
